name: FNT-AtoW (fan game)
description:
Fan made game starring the guys and gals over at Friday Night Tights! its basically an alpha test demo, just one stage with some cut scenes. There's a lot more id like to improve on, just with this demo including the controls, enemy AI, camera & cut-scenes, better text, add weapons, make each player feel a bit more different from each other.

coded and made the art myself. music wasn't me-> (https://soundcloud.com/rodrigo-flores) 

check out the other FNT game I made while watching the show, joke about Ryan eating floor food. https://sluggy-slurms.itch.io/floor-fries
